price: 49. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Kan Saaxirka  (caalimka) ahow! Noo bari Rabbigaa wuxuu kuugula ballantamay. (Haddii nalaga feydo cadaabka) waan hanuuni (raaci Xaqa).
arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَ ٱلسَّاحِرُ ٱدۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِندَكَ إِنَّنَا لَمُهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqālū yāayyuha al-sāḥiru ud'ʿu lanā rabbaka bimā ʿahida ʿindaka innanā lamuh'tadūna
